QuestData.Title: WANTED: Razorpaw!
QuestData.Description: Wanted for crimes against the innocent at the Ring of Trials!$b$bRazorpaw is responsible for leading several raids and ambushes against travelers on the road near Sabermaw.$b$bLast seen in the vicinity of the saberon den known as Sabermaw.$b$bExercise extreme caution!$b$bUpon completion, this bounty will be fulfilled by Pyxni Pennypocket of the Steamwheedle Cartel.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Wanted for crimes against the innocent!
QuestData.RewardText: You fought your way into Sabermaw, killed Razorpaw...and lived?$b$bThat's incredible news!$b$bThe roads will be much safer now that he's dead! That means more money for me!$b$bAs promised, here's your reward!
